definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: But can Chinese consumers win the case?
sentences.chinese: 但中國用戶是否能告倒東芝？

sentences.english: Toshiba ended production of incandescent light bulbs Wednesday, ending a 120-year manufacturing history of the products.
sentences.chinese: 日本東芝公司17日起停止生產普通白熾燈泡。

sentences.english: Unless Toshiba will be able to secure profits by other means, it could be risky, ' said Goldman Sachs analyst Ikuo Matsuhashi.
sentences.chinese: 除非東芝能夠通過其他手段保持利潤，否則風險不小。

sentences.english: Toshiba contacted Rossmann and offered to provide him with a replacement set for free, he said.
sentences.chinese: 東芝已和該生聯繫，將爲其免費更換一臺新機。

sentences.english: Toshiba said that it had not received a complaint so could not comment.
sentences.chinese: 東芝表示，尚未接到訴狀，因此不便置評。

sentences.english: Toshiba is doing similar work for the Japanese island of Miyako.
sentences.chinese: 東芝同時也爲日本宮古島做着相似的工作。

sentences.english: Toshiba said it would start manufacturing Blu-ray disc players.
sentences.chinese: 日本東芝公司聲稱要開始製造藍光光盤播放器。

sentences.english: Or something along the lines of the dual-screen Toshiba Libretto?
sentences.chinese: 或者沿用東芝Libretto的雙屏幕麼？

sentences.english: The Toshiba company is the main supplier of the players.
sentences.chinese: 東芝公司是此類影碟機的主要供應商。

sentences.english: But Toshiba decided that AACS was enough security.
sentences.chinese: 但是東芝認定AACS的安全性已足夠。

definition: Hon Hai Precision Industry Company, Taiwan technology company, aka Foxconn
Guo "Terry" Taiming (1950-), prominent Taiwanese businessman, founder of Foxconn
to start up (a motor)/to launch (a computer application)
operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
Nissan, Japanese car make/also transliterated 尼桑
